verses.verse: Afterward he brought me again<WH7725> unto<WH413> the door<WH6607> of the house;<WH1004> and, behold,<WH2009> waters<WH4325> issued out<WH3318> from under<WH4480> <WH8478> the threshold<WH4670> of the house<WH1004> eastward:<WH6921> for<WH3588> the forefront<WH6440> of the house<WH1004> stood toward the east,<WH6921> and the waters<WH4325> came down<WH3381> from under<WH4480> <WH8478> from the right side<WH4480> <WH3802> <WH3233> of the house,<WH1004> at the south<WH4480> <WH5045> side of the altar.<WH4196>

Then brought he me out<WH3318> of the way<WH1870> of the gate<WH8179> northward,<WH6828> and led me about<WH5437> the way<WH1870> without<WH2351> unto<WH413> the utter<WH2351> gate<WH8179> by the way<WH1870> that looketh<WH6437> eastward;<WH6921> and, behold,<WH2009> there ran out<WH6379> waters<WH4325> on<WH4480> the right<WH3233> side.<WH3802>

And when the man<WH376> that had the line<WH6957> in his hand<WH3027> went forth<WH3318> eastward,<WH6921> he measured<WH4058> a thousand<WH505> cubits,<WH520> and he brought<WH5674> me through the waters;<WH4325> the waters<WH4325> were to the ankles.<WH657>

Again he measured<WH4058> a thousand,<WH505> and brought<WH5674> me through the waters;<WH4325> the waters<WH4325> were to the knees.<WH1290> Again he measured<WH4058> a thousand,<WH505> and brought me through; the waters<WH4325> were to the loins.<WH4975>

Afterward he measured<WH4058> a thousand;<WH505> and it was a river<WH5158> that<WH834> I could<WH3201> not<WH3808> pass over:<WH5674> for<WH3588> the waters<WH4325> were risen,<WH1342> waters<WH4325> to swim in,<WH7813> a river<WH5158> that<WH834> could not<WH3808> be passed over.<WH5674>
And he said<WH559> unto<WH413> me, Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> hast thou seen<WH7200> this? Then he brought<WH1980> me, and caused me to return<WH7725> to the brink<WH8193> of the river.<WH5158>

Now when I had returned,<WH7725> behold,<WH2009> at<WH413> the bank<WH8193> of the river<WH5158> were very<WH3966> many<WH7227> trees<WH6086> on the one side<WH4480> <WH2088> and on the other.<WH4480> <WH2088>

Then said<WH559> he unto<WH413> me, These<WH428> waters<WH4325> issue out<WH3318> toward<WH413> the east<WH6930> country,<WH1552> and go down<WH3381> into<WH5921> the desert,<WH6160> and go into<WH935> the sea:<WH3220> which being brought forth<WH3318> into<WH413> the sea,<WH3220> the waters<WH4325> shall be healed.<WH7495>

And it shall come to pass,<WH1961> that every<WH3605> thing<WH5315> that liveth,<WH2416> which<WH834> moveth,<WH8317> whithersoever<WH413> <WH3605> <WH834> <WH8033> the rivers<WH5158> shall come,<WH935> shall live:<WH2421> and there shall be<WH1961> a very<WH3966> great<WH7227> multitude of fish,<WH1710> because<WH3588> these<WH428> waters<WH4325> shall come<WH935> thither:<WH8033> for they shall be healed;<WH7495> and every thing<WH3605> shall live<WH2416> whither<WH834> <WH8033> the river<WH5158> cometh.<WH935>

And it shall come to pass,<WH1961> that the fishers<WH1728> shall stand<WH5975> upon<WH5921> it from En-gedi<WH4480> <WH5872> even unto<WH5704> Eneglaim;<WH5882> they shall be<WH1961> a place to spread forth<WH4894> nets;<WH2764> their fish<WH1710> shall be<WH1961> according to their kinds,<WH4327> as the fish<WH1710> of the great<WH1419> sea,<WH3220> exceeding<WH3966> many.<WH7227>
But the miry places<WH1207> thereof and the marshes<WH1360> thereof shall not<WH3808> be healed;<WH7495> they shall be given<WH5414> to salt.<WH4417>

And by<WH5921> the river<WH5158> upon<WH5921> the bank<WH8193> thereof, on this side<WH4480> <WH2088> and on that side,<WH4480> <WH2088> shall grow<WH5927> all<WH3605> trees<WH6086> for meat,<WH3978> whose leaf<WH5929> shall not<WH3808> fade,<WH5034> neither<WH3808> shall the fruit<WH6529> thereof be consumed:<WH8552> it shall bring forth new fruit<WH1069> according to his months,<WH2320> because<WH3588> their waters<WH4325> they<WH1992> issued out<WH3318> of<WH4480> the sanctuary:<WH4720> and the fruit<WH6529> thereof shall be<WH1961> for meat,<WH3978> and the leaf<WH5929> thereof for medicine.<WH8644>

Thus <WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> This<WH1454> shall be the border,<WH1366> whereby<WH834> ye shall inherit<WH5157> <WH853> the land<WH776> according to the twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> tribes<WH7626> of Israel:<WH3478> Joseph<WH3130> shall have two portions.<WH2256>

And ye shall inherit<WH5157> it, one<WH376> as well as another:<WH251> concerning the which<WH834> I lifted up<WH5375> <WH853> mine hand<WH3027> to give<WH5414> it unto your fathers:<WH1> and this<WH2063> land<WH776> shall fall<WH5307> unto you for inheritance.<WH5159>

And this<WH2088> shall be the border<WH1366> of the land<WH776> toward the north<WH6828> side,<WH6285> from<WH4480> the great<WH1419> sea,<WH3220> the way<WH1870> of Hethlon,<WH2855> as men go<WH935> to Zedad;<WH6657>

Hamath, <WH2574> Berothah,<WH1268> Sibraim,<WH5453> which<WH834> is between<WH996> the border<WH1366> of Damascus<WH1834> and the border<WH1366> of Hamath;<WH2574> Hazarhatticon,<WH2694> which<WH834> is by<WH413> the coast<WH1366> of Hauran.<WH2362>

And the border<WH1366> from<WH4480> the sea<WH3220> shall be<WH1961> Hazar-enan,<WH2703> the border<WH1366> of Damascus,<WH1834> and the north<WH6828> northward,<WH6828> and the border<WH1366> of Hamath.<WH2574> And this is the north<WH6828> side.<WH6285>

And the east<WH6921> side<WH6285> ye shall measure<WH4058> from<WH4480> <WH996> Hauran,<WH2362> and from<WH4480> <WH996> Damascus,<WH1834> and from<WH4480> <WH996> Gilead,<WH1568> and from<WH4480> <WH996> the land<WH776> of Israel<WH3478> by Jordan,<WH3383> from the border<WH4480> <WH1366> unto<WH5921> the east<WH6931> sea.<WH3220> And this is the east<WH6921> side.<WH6285>

And the south<WH5045> side<WH6285> southward,<WH8486> from Tamar<WH4480> <WH8559> even to<WH5704> the waters<WH4325> of strife<WH4809> in Kadesh,<WH6946> the river<WH5158> to<WH413> the great<WH1419> sea.<WH3220> And this is the south<WH8486> side<WH6285> southward.<WH5045>

The west<WH3220> side<WH6285> also shall be the great<WH1419> sea<WH3220> from the border,<WH4480> <WH1366> till<WH5704> a man come<WH935> over against<WH5227> Hamath.<WH2574> This<WH2063> is the west<WH3220> side.<WH6285>
So shall ye divide<WH2505> <WH853> this<WH2063> land<WH776> unto you according to the tribes<WH7626> of Israel.<WH3478>

And it shall come to pass,<WH1961> that ye shall divide it by lot<WH5307> <WH853> for an inheritance<WH5159> unto you, and to the strangers<WH1616> that sojourn<WH1481> among<WH8432> you, which<WH834> shall beget<WH3205> children<WH1121> among<WH8432> you: and they shall be<WH1961> unto you as born in the country<WH249> among the children<WH1121> of Israel;<WH3478> they shall have<WH5307> inheritance<WH5159> with<WH854> you among<WH8432> the tribes<WH7626> of Israel.<WH3478>

And it shall come to pass,<WH1961> that in what<WH834> tribe<WH7626> the stranger<WH1616> sojourneth,<WH1481> there<WH854> <WH8033> shall ye give<WH5414> him his inheritance,<WH5159> saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>
